entry.title: Heal My Heart Oh Sweet Baby Of Mine
entry.summary:
Author: lixolz

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,817Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 49

Summary: Tim should’ve called someone, gotten help. But here he was, in a very small town, living his life with a baby that should’ve never existed in the first place. Everything was fine. He’ll heal himself and be the best widower single dad ever.OrTim Drake's journey to healing with his clone baby.
